summary: LOSS OF ACCELERATION ON INTERSTATE AND INNER CITY DRIVING. COMPLETE LOSS OF SPEED CONTROL,  PRESSING THE PEDAL TO THE FLOOR HAS NO EFFECT. EXTREMELY DANGEROUS WHEN THIS OCCURS. HAS BEEN HAPPENING SINCE 40,000 MILES. I FEAR FOR THE LIVES OF MY PASSENGERS, ESPECIALLY CHILDREN AND WILL NO LONGER USE THIS VEHICLE WITH THEM INSIDE.
